snippet: So far, eight people out of the thousands who visited the park this summer have been infected with the mouse-borne virus, which has no known cure.
abstract: Public health officials, after the death of a third person exposed to the deadly mouse-borne hantavirus in Yosemite National Park, expand their warning to include more than 22,000 visitors to the park in summer 2012; eight people to date have been infected.
lead_paragraph: So far, eight people out of the thousands who visited the park this summer have been infected with the mouse-borne virus, which has no known cure.

headline.seo: Third Hantavirus Death Prompts Wider Warning
headline.main: Wider Warning After 3rd Yosemite Hantavirus Death
headline.print_headline: Wider Warning After 3rd Yosemite Hantavirus Death
